text: Sonic's one of those series that I could never get in to.  Even in its glory days on the Genesis, I could never quite enjoy it.  If any game's gonna win me over, it'll probably be this one.  It looks really cool =P  I'm just hesitant to buy it since I've been disappointed with this series before =P

author: minty

text: Now that I've seen it in use, GOD I wish this was used someplace else in the game! The best theme, for a menu you'll be at for maybe 5 minutes total in the game, each visit for a mere 2 seconds? ARGH! This deserved some either the planet selection menu, title screen, or from the way it sounds some dramatic final stage of some sort, or possibly even a credits theme. But a mere menu? Doesn't do this song justice.

text: I've gotten every Sonic game admittingly as a gift(great grandmother before she died about 4 years back always thought I was 8 years old)& after I've almost gotten them out of tradition. But this is one I actually want to go out & get myself, not because everyone's saying "Sonic's back!" cause last I checked Sonic never died, he just had a bad console streak & decided to back seat to handhelds was all(Sonic Rush one of my fav Sonic games ever). It's because going back to his roots this time.
